\dWell done, everyone! Now let's eat, drink, and be\nmerry!\d%K%P
The night of the festival had drawn to a close.%K%P
The long-awaited closing party was about to begin.%K%P
The main hall was bustling with energy from people\nmore excited about the party than the festival\nitself.%K%P
\dAkira! Here, have a drink!\d%K%P
\dWhoa, sure. Thanks.\d%K%P
Though we were supposed to be hosting, the girls\nand I were given the seat of honor this time.%K%P
Yukari sat snugly next to me, pouring me drinks.%K%P
\dThere's a lot of good food, so eat up! What would\nyou like? I'll grab it for you!\d%K%P
Yukari was waiting on me hand and foot.%K%P
She made sure I had everything I needed.%K%P
\dThat's not fair, Yukari!\d%K%P
\dWe want to care for Akira too...\d%K%P
\dEhehehe! But he's all mine for tonight!\d%K%P
\dBecause I'm the winner of the poll. And only the\nwinner is worthy to sit beside Akira!\d%K%P
Yukari clung to my side as she said all that.%K%P
In the end, the dance performance had been the\ndeciding factor in the final vote, and Yukari had\nwon.%K%P
\dYou only won by a narrow margin!\d%K%P
\dI was so close...\d%K%P
\dI don't care, I won with the most number of votes\nand that's that!\d%K%P
\dGrrr...\d%K%P
Even the usually strong-willed Kaede couldn't say\nanything to refute that.%K%P
\dYou're all still equal in my eyes, of course.\d%K%P
\dYes, yes, of course. That's why I'll have you all\nto myself tonight, as the winner.\d%K%P
Yukari leaned on me affectionately, rubbing her\nskin against mine.%K%P
\dYou're making use of the situation to touch him!\d%K%P
\dEhehe! Such a strong and smooth chest...\d%K%P
\dOhh... I'm so envious...\d%K%P
\dHere, Akira, have some fried chicken. Say aah!\d%K%P
\dHrmph!\d *munch, munch*%K%P
\dI squeezed out some free time during the festival\nto personally make all this for you!\d%K%P
\dReally? Thanks! You're a great help.\d%K%P
\dThe local ladies helped too, to be precise.\d%K%P
\dEven so...\d%K%P
Kaede and Shion had had their hands full with the\nfestival and couldn't help prepare for the party.%K%P
I knew we would have visitors, as we usually did,\nbut I hadn't thought that Yukari would help out.%K%P
\dBuilding good relationships with the neighbors is\nan essential duty for a good wife.\d%K%P
\dYukari really is a fine young wife.\d%K%P
\dAww, no need to be so truthful!\d%K%P
\dHa-ha! You're a shrewd girl, and you know how to\ndeal with the drunks, which is good enough for me!\d%K%P
Yukari was chatting with an old lady nearby.%K%P
Wait, when did they become so friendly?%K%P
\dWe're on Yukari's side. You're the only wife fit\nfor Akira.\d%K%P
\dHehehe! You're much too kind.\d%K%P
\d...You were aiming for their votes?\d%K%P
\dJust a coincidence! I'd like to think my sincerity\nhas touched everyone's hearts.\d%K%P
Yukari smiled calmly.%K%P
Whether it was a victor's complacent smile, or the\nsmile of an approved wife, I couldn't tell.%K%P
Whatever the case, she seemed to be doing well, in\nher own way.%K%P
\dI didn't know she was targeting them...\d%K%P
\dIt was a blind spot. I was so sure I had the\nsupport of all the old men, too...\d%K%P
\dWomenfolk make the world go 'round. You can't\nwin without the help of hardworking ladies!\d%K%P
\dI guess you have a point.\d%K%P
Yukari, Shion, and Kaede had all been targeting\ndifferent groups of people.%K%P
Yukari's victory made it clear the village ladies\nhad a powerful say in how things were run.%K%P
\dAkira, I'll become a good wife, so...\d%K%P
\dWhat are you saying? You're already a great wife!\d%K%P
\dOkay, then I'll become an even better wife! I'll\nbecome good enough to be your number one!\d%K%P
\dI know you think of us as equals now, but I'll\nmake you fall for me with the power of love!\d%K%P
\dHehe...\d%K%P
\dEhehehe!\d%K%P
\dAhahaha! I can't stop laughing at the thought!\d%K%P
\dEverything's going according to plan! It's all\nworking out so smoothly!\d%K%P
\dI knew from the start he wouldn't marry only me.\nFor now, I'll just work on making him accept me.\d%K%P
\dThe battle's only just begun... I'll make him fall\nhard for me with my lovely charms.\d%K%P
\dI'll make him think long and hard about just who\nthe best wife for him is!\d%K%P
\dOh, Akira... Akira Akira Akira!!!\d%K%P
\dMy beloved husband... I love you...love you...\d%K%P
\dI'm head over heels in love with you... My true\nprince charming...\d%K%P
\dI'll make you know, with all your senses, how much\nof a woman I really am...\d%K%P
